About


Who Am I?


As a Creative Technologist based in New York City, my passions/areas of focus include web development, creative coding, interface design, and tech design education for underrepresented groups.

Credence


I believe in the idea that good design and accessible technology that is easy to use, provides a enjoyable experience and most importantly has social impact for society at large.

I embrace the idea of new methodologies as well as understanding one another and fair collaboration is crucial when it comes to the products and services we build

Thoughtful design and equality in tech are extremely important in today's ever connected world.

When I'm not building things, you can find me engaging with other techies on the web, at meetups, roaming in the woods, or looking for the next great thing to eat or listen to.



Lets Connect!

Made with love by Montique Stevens with Eleventy, a dash of my custom HTML, JS, SASS/CSS and a sprinkle of Font Awesome icons. Deployed with Netlify. TailwindCSS is used for additional styling.
